items.sentence: I hope you know the last thing that I want to do is go there without your permission.
This is the intersection where a three-year-old girl was run over by a bus last year.
I think girls spend more time talking about boys than boys spend talking about girls.
Tom and his friends use the school printer every month to print the student bulletin.
Our employees are working around the clock to fix the damage caused by the ice storm.
I hope that Tom understands French well enough, so I don't have to interpret for him.
If you were only able to meet with one historical figure, who would you like to meet?
How would you feel if you told Tom you loved him, but he told you he didn't love you?
The boss outlined a three-pronged approach to turn the fortune of the company around.
When in doubt tell the truth. It will confound your enemies and astound your friends.
